### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Government Car Rental Program
#### Call Reference Number
PW-22-01003788

#### Solicitation Number
EN578-230640

#### Closing Date
September 29, 2022, 1400 ET

The Government of Canada invites suppliers to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for a contract to provide car rental services for the Government Car Rental Directory. This Directory is used by federal departments and agencies, as well as other government entities, to access discounted rates for rental of passenger and commercial vehicles.

#### Key Requirements

* Suppliers must provide discounted, non-commissionable rates for rental of passenger and commercial vehicles.
* Suppliers must have a fleet of at least 10 rental vehicles per location and vehicles must not be older than the same model year as the period of the Standing Offer.
* Suppliers must provide Public Liability and Property Damage (PL/PD) insurance coverage, with a minimum of $1 million for Canada and $100,000 per person to a maximum of $300,000 per accident for the USA.
* Suppliers must remit administrative fees of $250 CAN for each city and $250 US for each airport located in Canada and the USA.

#### How to Participate
To receive the RFSO, suppliers must be added to the Government of Canada's source list of potential Car Rental Suppliers. To do so, suppliers must submit a request, including the following information:

* Business name
* Address
* Name and title of the person to receive the RFSO
* Telephone and fax numbers
* Language preference (English or French)

The RFSO must be received before 1400 ET on September 29, 2022, to be published in the Car Rental Directory on January 1, 2023.
